阞字的基本解释

阞
lè
地脉；地势：“凡沟，逆地阞，谓之不行。”
古通“仂”：“以其（毂）长为之围，以其围之阞捎其薮。”

阞字的汉语字典释义

[①]［lè］
［《廣韻》盧則切，入德，來。］
(1)地的脉理。
(2)裂开。
(3)通“仂”。馀数。

阞字的康熙字典解释

【戌集中】【阜字部】　阞； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页1345第11
【唐韻】盧則切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】歷得切，?音勒。【說文】地理也。【周禮·冬官考工記·匠人】凡溝逆地阞，謂之不行。【註】阞，謂脈理。不行，謂決溢也。　又通作仂。數之餘也。【周禮·冬官考工記·輪人】以其圍之阞，捎其數。【註】阞，三分之一也。【疏】凡言阞者，分散之言，數亦不定。是以王制云，祭用數之阞。

暂无。

vein
Basic explanation of words
vein
lè
Ground veins; topography: "Fangou, against the ground, it is impossible."
Gutong "廂": "Enclosed by its (hub) length, and surrounded by its encirclement."
vein
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［lè］
["Guangyun" Lu Zeqi, enter Germany, come. ]
(1) The veins of the earth.
(2) Cracking.
(3) Through "仂". Remainder.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【戌集】【Fu Character Department】　阞; Kangxi Strokes: 10; Page Number: Page 1345 No. 11
[Tang Yun] Lu Zeqie [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun] It's true to life,? Yin Le. [Said the text] Geography also. 【Zhou Li·Dongguan Kao Gong Ji·Craftsman】Fangou slammed against the ground, which is impossible. [Note] Yan, that is the principle of veins. No, it's definitely overflowing.　It's another pass. It's more than a few. 【Zhou Li·Dongguan Kao Gong Ji·Lun Ren】With its encirclement, count the number. [Note] Yan, one third. [Sparse] The number of words that are scattered, the number is uncertain. It is the king who makes the cloud and sacrifices the number of people.

пласты (почвы); жилы (в земле, на камне)
